item.description:
Good evening!

I hope that everyone will join us tomorrow the
grand opening of our first Ron Paul Headquarters
for Massachusetts! We have obtained some space
in Worcester and hope to have other stations opening
soon. Please come by tomorrow between 11 and
4 pm and help us with phone banking. With only a
few weeks left before the primary, we need everyone
on a phone calling supporters! We will have scripts
and phones (for those who don't have free minutes).
We will also have literature and signs available for
pickup and distribution. Hope to see you there!


Location: 3rd floor of building across
from Union Station in Worcester (we'll have signs out)

Time: 11am - 4pm (we'll be there as early as 9am to setup
so come early if you want to) We may stay later than 4pm
depending on people's availability.

If you have any questions, feel free to call me on my
cell phone at 205-601-2232.

Hope to see you there!

Brooke Moore
Lowell Precinct Captain
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Ron Paul signs on the new HQ
item.name: Ron Paul Massachusetts HQ Grand Opening
